answers.answer: I'm so ready!! I'm 36+2 weeks with preeclampsia and diabetes, I'm also on bed rest. Doctor says I have to just make it 5 more days and they can take her out of me cause I most likely won't make it to my original scheduled c-section date.

question: omg I have six more days to go nd I'm kinda nervous too
title: are your ready?? i am lol
